name: FIGS, Inc.
description: Manufacturer and seller of antimicrobial and wrinkle-free medical uniforms. The company's medical apparel is antimicrobial, wrinkle resistant, stain repellant, lint free and utilizes four-way stretch and is sold online via its customer-centric, vertically integrated ecommerce platform, enabling the customers to order medical apparel in different sizes and as per convenience.
